about_the_game: A special offer for Hive Jump 2: Survivors - including a digital art book curated by Graphite Lab and custom wallpapers. The book contains original pieces of in-game art, concept art and notes from the developer. Read more about the making of this game, the level structure, characters, universe and more.
detailed_description: A special offer for Hive Jump 2: Survivors - including a digital art book curated by Graphite Lab and custom wallpapers. The book contains original pieces of in-game art, concept art and notes from the developer. Read more about the making of this game, the level structure, characters, universe and more.
legal_notice: Hive Jump 2: Survivors © 2024 Graphite Lab, LLC & Midwest Games Company. All rights reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS or Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
